tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE escrow_details (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address VARCHAR(255),
    seller_name VARCHAR(100),
    buyer_name VARCHAR(100),
    deposit_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    contract_conditions TEXT,
    funds_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE real_estate_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT NOT NULL,
  buyer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  seller_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE real_estate_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address VARCHAR(255),
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255),
    seller_name VARCHAR(255),
    escrow_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    contract_conditions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE buyers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE sellers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    seller_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE escrow_details (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT REFERENCES real_estate_transactions(id),
    funds_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    escrow_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE real_estate_escrow (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(50),
    seller_name VARCHAR(50),
    property_address VARCHAR(100),
    escrow_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE escrow_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    escrow_id UUID REFERENCES real_estate_escrow(id),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE escrow_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    escrow_id UUID REFERENCES real_estate_escrow(id),
    document_name VARCHAR(100),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE escrow_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    escrow_id UUID REFERENCES real_estate_escrow(id),
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    action_date DATE,
    action_description TEXT
);
